website_summaries.verdict: A good buy for those who want a swivel mirror that's easy to assemble and adjust.
pros: Sturdy design and lack of distortion
We love the classic oak finish and tilting feature
cons: A few consumers received damaged products, and a few were dissatisfied with the color

customer_reviews.title: ... sitting in my cart for forever and I'm so happy drunk me decided to make this drunk purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been sitting in my cart for forever and I'm so happy drunk me decided to make this drunk purchase. Super good price, amazing quality and it took like 5 minutes to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Sturdy, No Distortion
customer_reviews.text: First, and most important, this mirror provides an accurate reflection regardless of the angle. Will accommodate any height. My husband is 6'4" and was able to get full view by tilting back a little. Much better than my fun house wall mirror. It took 5 minutes to assemble. Is very sturdy, yet not too heavy, so it can be easily moved. Checked thoroughly and no cracks, nicks, or warps. Beautiful accent piece. Design and color go perfect with my bedroom furniture. Dark cherry finish looks exactly like photo. This is a great value for such a nice piece. Worth every penny. Now I can leave the house with confidence of knowing how I actually look.
customer_reviews.author: DRM-TX

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great product !
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how easy this product was to assemble! It took me around 5 minutes. It’s very stable wood, not easy to tip over. Looks very beautiful and had a normal white color with a cool undertone.
customer_reviews.author: Kapkis

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, and a great value. It could easily be mistaken for a $250 mirror...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased at how quickly this arrived, but it was intact and surprisingly easy to assemble. In less than 5 minutes I was looking at my reflection from head to toe, with no distortion. Nine pieces of wood, four screws, two washers and two bolts, plus one mirror unit adds up to a quick and easy assembly job, resulting in an attractive and functional piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hentges

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after looking in stores and flea markets for months. This was cheaper than anything I was able to find and honestly looks better than most of the options out there. This is of course not heirloom quality furnisher, but for $50 you should not expect it to be. You can expect it to look good and to last a long time. Ours has survived a few moves and a couple of years now. Mirror dimensions are accurate as advertised, but just keep in mind that after setting it up it does seem a little short. Good thing it tilts!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE/ STURDY/ PERFECT and UNDAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great and sturdy mirror. Least amount of time to put together maybe 10 min. The mirror arrived perfect and undamaged. My daughter is a visual artist in her high school and the mirror comes in handy, when she has to draw herself. The color I chose is WHITE, easy to go with other white furniture in her room. We love this piece and recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToShop

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mirror, Reasonably Priced!
customer_reviews.text: In stores, one would pay twice as much for a mirror such as this. We were relieved upon opening the package to see everything was intact and in excellent condition. The pieces were of medium weight -- heavy enough to be decent quality yet light enough for practicality. Assembly was fairly easy (another more mechanically inclined family member did this but it only took 10 minutes!). Easy to follow instructions. The mirror is beautiful and shows the entire reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Ethereal

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when i opened the box to find it broken in several places. The box didn't look too beat up, but one leg was broken, and the mirror frame had a crack in it, along with a small crack in the actual mirror. I sent it back immediately, and due to how cheaply it is made, i will not be purchasing again. I guess you get what you pay for. Also, make sure you check the dimensions. It was much smaller than i had imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Way to go
customer_reviews.text: This mirror I had priced else where could not believe that I got it so cheap and how beautiful it is nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Levy

customer_reviews.title: Handsome mirror
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful mirror, looks way more expensive than it is. Was easy to put together by myself. The only minor thing is that I seem to need to tighten the rings on the sides regularly, or the mirror suddenly starts tilting on its own. Maybe I just didn't tighten them enough the first time. Great for tilting & getting a full view of your whole outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Piffle

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like an old time movie star when I use it! Quite stunning to look at and, although the glass is oval, you still get a full body image - has no flaws or warps in the image either. It took me 4 and 1/2 minutes to put together yet it looks like a solid piece - a stunning effect to my bedroom - oh and it's so light that you can place it wherever you want at any time! Love It!
customer_reviews.author: PattyK92Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for mom!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for mothers day. She's been using it for over a month now with no issues. It is a little weak feeling, but I know my mom won't be fusing with it, so it will last a good long time. It might not be the best for a young person who will want to move it around frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Missy B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble - Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 5 minutes to set up. Stable and nicely made. Well packaged and arrived four days earlier than estimated. Look great in the bedroom. All it took was putting the legs on first - went on with no problem. Then using the two screws and washers into the side of frame to hold the mirror. Finally adjusting it to the position best for viewing. WOW nothing to it - and, as stated, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Just Mike's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: ... or bedroom out of the way - would not recommend as a display mirror in a main area of ...
customer_reviews.text: as advertised - not a very expensive looking piece of furniture but does the job if you keep it in a closet or bedroom out of the way - would not recommend as a display mirror in a main area of the house
customer_reviews.author: ASU

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yourself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror in the Dark Cherry wood version and I did not unpack it for 2 months believing that it was going to be a big undertaking to assemble-I couldn't have been more wrong. It was SO EASY to put together, about 20 minutes and NO TOOLS!........The mirror is worth every penny. It's beautiful and looks way more expensive than it actually cost! Treat yourself if you were like me and was used to leaving the house and not knowing how/what I "looked" like!
customer_reviews.author: Luriergo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mirror. Decent height and sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror. Decent height and sturdy material. I've been told that it looks like an antique. Great deal for such a low price. P.S if you’re a bit on the taller side, I’d say 5”6 above- then you’ll have to tilt the mirror back a bit to see your body fully. Not much of a burden as a 5”10 person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mirror! Both my husband and I are small people (he’s 5’5” and I’m 5’1”) and this mirror is perfect! It was so easy to put together and took us a total of like 10 minutes. Obviously we ordered it not expecting an extravagant piece of furniture but we were plasantly surprised. we like that it’s adjustable. Fits great in our corner!
customer_reviews.author: Amber lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mirror and it didn't appear to be complicated to assemle. Unfortunately, the screw on one of the knobs that would hold the legs on was too short, so it wouldn't screw in place to hold the legs in place.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. It was perfect for my daughter's room! I only gave it 3 stars because it arrived with a nice sized crack in the wood frame part. Not enough that I wanted to hassle with sending it back or anything but it's there. :/
customer_reviews.author: mnsgardner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful and ornate...right size for me and my space. I thought "Oh No" when I saw I'd have to put it toghther but it was very simple and good instruction sheet came with it. It's sturdy and arrived in perfect condition. I love a good price and quality, and feel this mirror is both.
customer_reviews.author: MOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Piece!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally had the time to assemble and it was so easy and quick. The instructions were missing but was easy to figure out just by looking at the picture. The piece is beautiful and looks far more expensive than the price. It's very sturdy. The mirror is distortion free. I am 5 foot 7 inches and I have a full view. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DiAne

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s cheaper than a solid, stain-grade wood mirror. There were a few splits in the wood and the wood also split while assembling. I needed a mirror so I didn’t feel like returning. I mean, it’s a mirror. It does it’s job at reflecting lol. The quality of the mirror itself is good. No bubbles or waves.
customer_reviews.author: Lonica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting this together and I'm 70 years old with no patience, however it was easy and I was surprised I could hold the mirror and balance putting in the screws. I recommend this purchase, Very nice wood finish. carol Purvis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legacy Decor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the purchase of the Legacy Full-Length Floor Mirror. It's well made, easy to assemble, and perfect for anyone who would like a full-length mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Zipp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and they match the other I have.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Mirror - Easy to Assemble (No Tools)
customer_reviews.text: This elegant mirror is probably one of my most favorite purchases this year. It has a cherry oak finish, and it looks very expensive. It takes less than 10 minutes to assemble and does not require tools. The swivel action makes it a perfect, adjustable mirror. The instructions are the size of a 1/4 sheet, front and back (1 page) and are surprisingly well written. (Most instructions need more instructions just to understand what is supposed to be done.)
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, although the cherry is a bit more red than my furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking mirror. I bought the cherry and although very pretty, it’s more red than my cherry bedroom set. Still, for the price, it’s great!very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Dignon

customer_reviews.title: To make matters worse the mirror had 2 black chips in it and ...
customer_reviews.text: The mirror took a week to arrive with prime. To make matters worse the mirror had 2 black chips in it and I had to go through alot of hassle to repack it and tape it and return to a UPS drop off! Poor Quality Control! If i could give no stars I would. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: No Hardware
customer_reviews.text: This product looks amazing IN THE BOX! Mine came with NO hardware to put it together. Legacy Decor refused to help with this and kept referring me to Amazon. Amazon refunded my money and I get to keep the mirror but it's sitting in the box under my bed until I can make it to a hardware store. Extremely disappointed in Legacy Decor for not handling this issue!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Dille

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying this because of reviews showing it arriving broken. Mine arrived perfectly in tact. The wood is also solid so it's very sturdy (and heavy). The photos really don't do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically it is exactly what I had been looking for and the price was great. It is smaller than I assumed it would be but it is in a smaller room with a 7' ceiling so it works. Easy assembly. It did arrive with cracks in the wood but I didn't feel an exchange was worth dealing with, especially since other reviews mentioned this was an issue. Overall, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: NYgal

customer_reviews.title: NO BOLTS IN BOX!!! MISSING!!!
customer_reviews.text: All of the bolts were missing from the box!!!!! Unbelievable!!!!! Nothing to hold it together! This company must just buy this cheap stuff from China without even checking it prior to selling it themselves :(
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: A Period Piece You'll Love
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a lovely addition to any room. It's quite the statement piece! The quality is well worth the price. The only slight disappointment to note is the mirror is not double sided. There is an unfinished wood-like piece of material on the back, which can be kept hidden if the back of the mirror is facing a wall. I got the cherry brown and the color is true to what you see in the picture. Very antique-like.
customer_reviews.author: Asya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift. Shipping was pretty quick, but when it arrived the box had some dents and tears in it. Thankfully, the mirror inside was all in tact and didn't have any damage. It was super easy to set up and looks very nice. It's a pretty wood black color that looks great next to all other colored furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews and crossed fingers and viola. No broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews and crossed fingers and viola. No broken mirror. No "tilting slowly" It does what it does and stays the way it needs to be haha It went very well in my room
customer_reviews.author: ZenRaij

customer_reviews.title: Floor Length Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she loved it as it matched her bedroom furniture. I thought the quality was better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Nice, other than cosmetic damage...
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror, solid frame, but arrived with a slight crack in the wood, more cosmetic than structural so I kept it, but it was disappointing. Were it not for that, it would have gotten at least 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lilcreative

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and is perfect for small room with limited space.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price I paid for. Should have read descrption carefully. Mirror too narrow and slightly short. Stand side posts are slightly narrow, but sturdy enough to hold this size of a mirror. Overall, it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: SamH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful peace, frustrated patron however due to loose knob ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful peace, frustrated patron however due to loose knob screw accountable for assembly completion. It certainly happens but it happened twice this week! Many more orders coming this week..truly hope my charming luck has passed!
customer_reviews.author: Yasser Faiq

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup & looks great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mirror for my wife and she loves it. Assembled in 10 minutes. No chips, dents, breaks, anything. Very light, too! Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Item smaller than appears
customer_reviews.text: Lovely mirror and finish is perfect. Very eady to assemble. Was mildly surprised at how small it was after assemble. Overall good value for the price. L
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I actually painted it white and glued some jewels on it so it would match my 10 yr old granddaughter's room. It's the right size for her but would be too small for an adult. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is perfect for my makeup room. The size was perfect. It wasn’t too big or too small. Can be used for a girls room or small corner in a bedroom. I chose the white to go with my furniture and it’s great! Also it took me about 5 mins to assemble. All the parts to assemble with directions where included and no damages pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Kiely T

customer_reviews.title: Full Length Mirrow
customer_reviews.text: Item was as advertised and met my need for a full length floor mirrow
customer_reviews.author: Jerry T. Crews

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mirror
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mirror. It is completely adjustable and completely gorgeous. I wasn't expecting much, with the price being so low, but it is beautiful and extremely easy to assemble! It took about 5 minutes (while drinking) to put together. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rec'd this yesterday & put it all together by myself in less than 30 minutes. It is a nice looking mirror, especially for the price!!!! So far I have no complaints at all. If I need one in my other spare bedroom & it comes in a different color, I will order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Missing knobs on the bottoms of the legs, make sure to purchase wood glue....
customer_reviews.author: kamal & Gina Nasr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Guest bedroom....also for grand daughters. they love it....its lightweight, yet looks more expensive. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Dewdrop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this mirror to match my vanity set and it matches really nice. It’s perfect and light. Easy to assemble. My husband and son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: marcci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my granddaughter. Picture reflected the item perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Cute mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror but the only downside to it are the legs stick out too much in the front. I wish the bottom stand was built differently
customer_reviews.author: Rhyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror. It is well made and was relative easy to assemble. I got it was a really great price. It was an excellent investment, because I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived defective. I reached out to the seller, and was sent a replacement part about a week later. Mirror isn't the most sturdy but looks beautiful in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sheenbean

customer_reviews.title: really waste money, return it and don’t recommend st all
customer_reviews.text: Recived by broken, really waste money, return it and don’t recommend st all. Terrible quality control!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this mirror is a great buy for the cost. It was extremely easy to assemble and the mirror quality is great and it’s not warped. I would recommend it though for a child’s room. I am 5’7 and have to angle the mirror back pretty far to get a full body view.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition and arrived fast
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and arrived fast. Looks great for the price, this was the cheapest by far I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, my 14 year old put it together, very sturdy and very classy looking! Perfect for the money
customer_reviews.author: Shaylen

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: Considering how much it costs..its worth it. It's made in Taiwan and its questionable if its made of solid wood but it doesn't look cheap or feel flimsy. Would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: GMcG

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked in the wood!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at first until I went to install the mirror and there is a big ugly crack. I read more reviews and saw that I'm not the only one that had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: AndyT

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We needed a bedroom mirror, this fit the bill perfectly. It was better than I expected for the price, and was delivered on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife, it's a beautiful strong sturdy much more expensive looking piece than the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: ... of the part to fit but it seems really sturdy. The box was quite damaged upon arrival but ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to really work to get some of the part to fit but it seems really sturdy. The box was quite damaged upon arrival but everything inside was intact.
customer_reviews.author: liivingdeadgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mirror and very stylish. The wood finish is high quality and the product was delivered fast!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Solid, nice looking mirror
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who wanted a full-length mirror. She loves how this looks and feels. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Butler

customer_reviews.title: I like this mirror but unfortunately arrives with damage
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror but unfortunately arrives with damage,the box was open in one side and the wood paint have some scratches,I was about to return it but I don't have time I work a lot so we keep it like that:(
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Parada

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty mirror but the mirror its self is a little distorting.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barr

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror and Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. Contacted the seller and they sent me the new parts quickly. After all was done, Mirror looks and functions great! Was looking at several others at local furniture stores, and after arriving, this one is comparable in quality and much lower in price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobs stuff

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the purchase. Arrived with broken glass and cracked wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kec3792

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This mirror provides exactly what I need in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and it’s a full view
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my daughter She likes it
customer_reviews.author: Charlene F. Sevin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous addition!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is a perfect addition to my daughters room! We love it for dress up !
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that modern Victorian vibe, and function, too! Bought second-hand and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than the photo!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror looked even nicer than the photo, but the frame had a large crack in it. Rather than return, it I kept it. It was super easy to assemble the frame. All in all, I'm very happy and would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install. It just took me 10 minutes to assemble. Looks great and my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Varma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this mirror was so easy to assemble, looks great and was delivered without being broken (I had three other mirrors from another company come broken)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. No distortion in mirror. Nice real wood frame and stand. Super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, I did it by myself. Took all of 10 minutes. Great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cheval Floor Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it met all expectations. My granddaughter loved it and it came quickly, in time for her birthday even though it wasn't promised to be.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. FABBRI

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas it had a couple scratches on it but even with that my wife loved it so much that she still said to give it 5 stars. Nice and steady easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: California Doberman

customer_reviews.title: Cherry mirror
customer_reviews.text: Several "rubs" in the frame of the mirror that I will need to correct.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, be careful with materials.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, but experienced some issues with the assembly hardware and screws. This led to one of the legs cracking. It'll work until we find something we like more.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: One of the pieces had a flaw in it but ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces had a flaw in it but I could fix it and it wasn't really a big deal and with that aside it is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer Ricky
customer_reviews.text: The product is quality. The shipment was on time ! Also, the price is unbeatable. Happy Customer Ricky
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mirror, no funhouse effect!
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. Item was intact on arrival. Glass was slightly cloudy but used windex and the cloudiness was gone. Can be adjusted (swivel up or down) and holds position. BEST OF ALL NO FUN HOUSE EFFECT! No distortion noted whatsoever. Accommodates my husband who is 6' tall as well as myself with swiveling downward at 5'4". Have not found this good of quality in stores. There was some areas of wood that were more raised than others with close inspection but nothing visible at a 2-3 ft distance. Assembly was super easy, took less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Took me 5 minutes to assemble and looks like I spent more money than I did. Definitely adds some elegance to the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I ordered this. It looked like it was exactly what I wanted. I read some bad reviews about cracked wood and no instructions to assemble. I had no problems at all. It came with all wood intact. The mirror is nice with no distortions. The color is nice. It was easy to assemble (directions came with mine). It feels sturdy. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: I think it is pretty and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It has a slight distortion in the mirror but was able to position it in a way that works. I think it is pretty and seems sturdy. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cents

customer_reviews.title: ... can't beat if for the price and it was pretty easy to put together--I did notice some cracks and ...
customer_reviews.text: you can't beat if for the price and it was pretty easy to put together--I did notice some cracks and chips but overall I'm very happy wit the purchase
customer_reviews.author: antoinette panico

customer_reviews.title: The mirror was easy to put together and all parts were included
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Cherry color. It is almost red. The mirror was easy to put together and all parts were included.
customer_reviews.author: SL2000

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! I was able to put it together in ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I was able to put it together in under 2 minutes and it looks and feels like a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! Bought for 8 year old, assembled upon arrival to eliminate any potential issues. No problems, well worth the money. Shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: It made a great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter for her 6th birthday. She is a little princess and just loves it. It made a great birthday present!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for my chalk paint application
customer_reviews.text: I plan to apply a distressed chalk paint finish to this mirror so it didn't matter too much that the woodwork was a bit rough. You get what you pay for and it serves my purpose. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DCMadam

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cheap wood , cracked when I put it together. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror for the price and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Broken or missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. I ordered this same mirror twice. First time it arrived with a missing leg, second time it arrived with a broken wood panel around the mirror. Very annoying to go through the return.
customer_reviews.author: Warren W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this, looks great for the price, really can't go wrong here
customer_reviews.author: ward1999

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: As expected, shows my reflection, came on time, matched my furniture, what more could I ask. I like it, it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Got a fantastic deal on this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Got a fantastic deal on this mirror. Came packaged nicely and no scratches or damage. Easy to lift and the mirror stays in place when angling.
customer_reviews.author: losiar

customer_reviews.title: Great looking mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror fits anywhere, and is good looking, and does what it's meant to. Make me look good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

product_meta.title: Legacy Decor Swivel Full Length Wood Cheval Floor Mirror, Oak Finish New
product_meta.description: Color:OakThis traditional Cheval mirror is perfect to add some elegance and beauty to your home. The mirror swings between two decorative posts and is easily adjustable for the position desired.
feature_bullets: Mirror features a tilt function on pivot arm
